characters.name: Ash Lynx
characters.description:
__Height:__ 180 cm (5'11")
__Nationality:__ American-Irish

Ash has the personality, charisma, and skill to gather large groups of individuals together under his influence. Not only is he excellent in combat and an incredible marksman, but he's also highly intelligent with an IQ of 200. His intelligence lends itself well to solving the mystery of 'Banana Fish' and he has also been stated to be quite well-read, knowing his way around the newspaper's daily columns and political novels - unusual for someone who did not finish middle school.

Along with his remarkable intelligence, Ash's good looks and charisma allow him to sway the will of people to his benefit in dire situations, and he's well aware of it. Despite the influence he holds over others, however, Ash is mistrustful and holds most people at arms-length except for a few select friends in his inner circle, the most notable being Eiji Okumura. He is not afraid of death not because of courage, as he calls himself a coward, but because of his disillusionment with his own life.

(Source: Banana Fish Wiki)

characters.name: Eiji Okumura
characters.description:
__Height:__ 172 cm
__Nationality:__ Japanese
__Languages:__ Japanese, English
__Background:__ Eiji was a talented athlete and pole vaulter in Japan, until a injury left him unable to compete. Completely discouraged, faced with losing his sports scholarship, and ridiculed by his former competitors and coaches, Eiji fell into a depressed slump. Then Ibe took him in as his assistant, and the two traveled to New York City, to do a report on youth in street gangs. In New York, Eiji met Ash Lynx.  

__Best 80's Fashion Statement:__ Hawaiin shirt over a tank top, tied in the front, falling off one shoulder.  

__Inspiration:__ In an interview, author Akimi Yoshida said that the character design for Eiji was inspired by Japanese actor Nomura Hironobu.

characters.name: Sing Soo-Ling
characters.description:
**Height:** 165 cm, 191 cm (Garden of Light)
**Nationality:** Chinese-American

Sing Soo-Ling is the current leader of the Chinatown mafia, the younger half-brother of Lao Yen Tai.

characters.name: Max Lobo
characters.description: __May contain spoilers:__  "Max Lobo" is the pen name of Max Glenreed, a good-natured Vietnam veteran, former cop, journalist, novelist, and jailbird. As a journalist, Max wrote a regular column for the Village Tribune. He also wrote a novel about the Vietnam war called Seven Hundred and Thirty Days in Saigon. When we first meet Max in the manga, he is jailed for punching a cop. However, considering his cozy relationship with Charlie, Antonio, and even the prison guards, there is a strong suggestion that Max is keeping himself in jail as long as he wants. He practically brags that he could get out at any time; however, staying locked up seems to be serving the purpose of good old-fashioned investigative journalism.    Ever since the Vietnam war, Max has been hot on the trail of "Banana Fish," and has secretly been collecting notes and research for years. In Vietnam, his close friend Griffin Callenreese took some illicit drugs and went on bad trip, going on a shooting rampage and killing fellow members of his unit; it was Max, ultimately, who shot Griff's legs out from underneath him and stopped the carnage. Max had to abandon Griffin to the "nut house" in Saigon, although after the end of the war, he spent years searching for Griffin's whereabouts. To this day, Max is haunted by the memory of Griffin. Later on in the story, this guilt drives him to protect Ash from danger, despite the antagonistic relationship that Ash initially forces him into.    Max provides a lot of comic relief in the story. He sometimes acts as a fool, sometimes as an idiot savant. He loves his son and his ex-wife, Jessica, even though he is deathly afraid of Jessica's temper.    In an interview, Akimi Yoshida said that Max's character design was based on actor Harrison Ford.    (Source: boukenshin.net & HotaruKara)

characters.name: Yue-Lung Lee
characters.description:
__Height__:172 cm

He is one of the main antagonists of the series and the youngest son of the Lee family, the largest crime family in China.

(Source: BANANA FISH Wiki)

characters.name: Shorter Wong
characters.description:
Shorter is the "boss" of Chinatown, a loyal friend to Ash, and a criminal with a heart of gold. Like Ash, Shorter is an unusual "thug" with a deep sense of honor, and a drive to always do the right thing. He'll go to any lengths to protect his loved ones... even when the interests of those closest to him come into irreconcilable conflict.

Shorter is clever, resourceful, and as tough as steel. He's equally skilled at brawling, shooting, and sneaking around like a shadowy thief. Shorter can disguise himself as a completely different person, and fool even Eiji into thinking that he is a dotty old Chinese man.

Shorter has an irrepressible sense of humor and can wear a lopsided, devilish grin even during the grimmest of circumstances. Like Ash, he is a charismatic leader who can easily unite the other kids on the street under his rule.

At the beginning of the series, Shorter has a mohawk hairdo. But by volume two he has shaved off all of his hair and is completely bald. Shorter's trademark fashion statement is his ever-present sunglasses. He even wears them while sneaking around a cornfield in the middle of the night! In an interview, Akimi Yoshida said that Shorter's character design was inspired by Sanburaza Nakano. 

(Source: boukenshin.net, HotaruKara)

characters.name: Blanca
characters.description:
__Height:__ 196 cm (6'5")
__Hair Color:__ Brown

A retired assassin and the man who trained [Ash Lynx](https://anilist.co/character/13580/Ash-Lynx) to become heir to [Dino Golzine](https://anilist.co/character/132705/Dino-Francis-Golzine). Even though he cares for Ash, Blanca is a highly effective killer who dutifully carries out any contract he is hired for, such as when he is hired by [Yut-Lung](https://anilist.co/character/29576/YueLung-Lee) to murder [Eiji Okumura](https://anilist.co/character/21928/Eiji-Okumura). Ultimately declining to, Blanca instead defects to Ash's gang. He is shown to have excellent hand to hand combat skills, and insanely talented at long-range sniping.

characters.name: Shunichi Ibe
characters.description: A Japanese photojournalist who comes to New York City to do a report on street gangs.

characters.name: Skip
characters.description: An African-American boy, and member of Ash's gang.

characters.name: Dino Golzine
alt_names: ディノ・フランシス・ゴルツィネ
Dino F. Golzine (ディノ・F・ゴルツィネ)
characters.description:
__Height__: 178 cm

A major mafia boss in New York City, and the adoptive guardian of Ash Lynx. He has a taste for young boys.

characters.name: Frederick Arthur
alt_names: フレデリック・オーサー
characters.description:
__Height__: 182 cm

A vindictive and cruel ex-member of Ash's street gang, who allies himself with Golzine in order to usurp Ash.

characters.name: Alex
characters.description: Alex is the second-in-command in Ash's Gang.

characters.name: Jim Callenreese
alt_names: ジム・カーレンリース
characters.description: Jim Callenreese is Ash and Griffin's dad.

characters.name: Charlie Dickinson
alt_names: チャーリー・ディキンソン
characters.description: Charlie Dickinson is a homicide detective as well as a friend of Max, when the two later met in a police academy.

characters.name: Willard Evanstine
characters.description: Evanstine is a member of the New York City police.

characters.name: Michael Glenreed
characters.description: Michael Glenreed is the son of Max and Jessica.

characters.name: Alexis Dawson
alt_names: アレクシス・ドースン
characters.description: Alexis Dawson is a pathologist at the University of California.

characters.name: Dr. Meredith
alt_names: ドクター・メレディス
characters.description: Dr. Meredith is a back alley doctor. He helps Ash both with looking after Griffin, and finding out what a white powdery substance is that's not heroin.

characters.name: Hua Lung Lee
characters.description: Lee Hua Lung is one of the Lee brothers.

characters.name: Nadia Wong
characters.description: Shorter's sister. She works at Chang Dai restaurant in Chinatown.

characters.name: Wang Lung Lee
characters.description: Lee Wang Lung is the eldest child and heir to the Lee family.

characters.name: Gregory
characters.description: Gregory is a bodyguard for Dino Golzine.

characters.name: Eduardo L. Fox
alt_names: エドアル ・L・フォックス
characters.description:
**Height:** 190 cm

He is the leader of a mercenary group and former regimental leader of the French Foreign Legion.

characters.name: Cain Blood
characters.description:
__Height__: 192 cm

The Boss of African-American youth gang Black Sabbath. Referees Ash's fight with Arthur and later supports Ash and his gang in the war against the Corsican mafia.

characters.name: Marvin Crosby
alt_names: マービン・クロスビー
characters.description: Works for Dino Golzine.

characters.name: Yuen-Tai Lao
characters.description: Lao Yen Tai is Sing's half-brother. ~!Though Sing forgives Ash Lynx for killing Shorter Wong, after being told about Banana Fish, Lao is not told the truth about Shorter's death and continues to distrust him and resents Sing's deference to Ash in the ongoing gang war.!~

characters.name: Abraham Dawson
alt_names: エイブラハム・ドースン
characters.description: Abraham Dawson is the younger brother of Alexis, who defied his brother's wishes to destroy Banana Fish, and continues to develop and weaponize the drug for the Corsican mob into his adulthood. As a doctor during the Vietnam War, he tested Banana Fish on unknowing soldiers, including Griffin in Banana Fish. ~!He was later shot by Ash Lynx for experimenting on Shorter Wong.!~

characters.name: Jennifer
characters.description: Lives with Jim Callenreese. She's the stepmom of Ash and Griffin.

characters.name: Antonio Jenkins
characters.description: He is a homicide detective.

characters.name: Jessica Randy
characters.description: She is a journalist, as well as the ex-wife of Max and mother of Michael.

characters.name: George Scott
characters.description: He acts as Ash Lynx's lawyer to set Ash free from jail through his connection with Max Lobo.

characters.name: Bones
characters.description: Bones is a lieutenant in Ash's gang.

characters.name: Thomas Holstock
characters.description: ~!He was killed by Blanca.!~

characters.name: McMurphy
characters.description: McMurphy is a FBI agent.

characters.name: The Fly
characters.description: He is a supplier of black-market goods.
